text: The Open Montpellier Méditerranée Métropole Hérault is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor clay courts. The event is classified as a $25,000+H ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Montpellier, France, since 2006. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%"
